synopsis.p: Generate an index for a file in the rFile format.

description.p: Generates an index of a data file in the rFile data format. The index is written to standard output.
The index contains the start and end times of each record, together with the file offset of the start of each record.

example.description: Generates an index of the data file "test.dat" and stores it in the file "test.inx".
